alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 1:01PM MST until January 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1-3 inches. * WHERE...Pueblo County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow bands have set up over the area, and while accumulations are low, snow fall rates in excess of 1- 2 inches per hour may reduce visibility and impede travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
